name: FTPUploader
description: For uploading files using FTP protocol.
author: januskamphansen

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: SourcePath
inputs.helpMarkDown: File(s) to be uploaded.  Wildcards can be used. For example, `**` for all files in all subfolders.

inputs.name: serverName
inputs.label: FTP Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Address where the file(s) will be uploaded to. Eg. ftp://ftp.mysite.com/

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username for the FTP server. Use anonymous for anonymous login.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the FTP server. Use your e-mail address for anonymous login.

inputs.name: remotePath
inputs.label: Remote Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder on the FTP server where the files are to be put.

inputs.name: deleteOldFiles
inputs.label: Delete Old Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete old files on FTP server before uploading.
